name: Terd Herd
description:
Made for the GM48 gamejam in 48 hours in January 2017.

https://gm48.net/game/420/terd-herd

Summary

Terd Herd is a game about controlling these little creatures called Terds, and leading them to the goal. Each level has a required number of Terds at the finish line so be sure to wake up your sleeping friends in the dirt.

One HP!

The Terds only have 1HP so be sure not to run into danger alone!

Get 100%!

Each level has 3 stars to find - be sure to collect them all.

Controls

Click Terds with the mouse for commands or Drag a box and highlight several Terds to command
